Text: Why not share the original flac?
For starters, I couldn't find the FLAC on here (but I also didn't look that hard).  And when I downloaded the FLAC I converted to ALAC so I thought I'd put it on here.

the other one, the cd-rip, is here:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5069462/RA_A_yksopp_-_Junior
But my remark there about "loudness war" makes me wonder what this one sounds like. Probably the same compression but worse sound from recording the LP on iffy equipment.
